title: DecompileTransactionIntentRequest
description: This function does the opposite of the compile_transaction_intent function. It takes in a compiled transaction intent and decompiles it into its human-readable / machine-readable format.

instructions_output_kind.description: Defines the output format that we would like the manifest to be in after this request is performed.

compiled_intent.description: A byte array serialized as a hex string which represents the compiled transaction intent to decompile.

InstructionKind.description: An enum which describes the kind of manifest instructions.
